english.segment1: I thought I had it all under control. I thought my fate was still in my hands. All of my plans were firmly set. By the words that I say
english.segment2: I forgot how quickly things can change. Now my vision can not be the same
english.segment3: [CHORUS:]. My life is not what I thought. I'm not where I planned to be. Though something's gone. There's nothing wrong with my changing world. Though something's gone. There's nothing wrong with my changing world
english.segment4: I need to let go of my destiny. I need to trust in things unseen. I believe in having faith. Though I yield my control
english.segment5: I forgot how quickly things can change. Now my vision can not be the same
english.segment6: [BRIDGE:]. I'm embracing all of my fears. I am watching them turn to delight. The very fears which were gripping my mind. Are now the hands shaping and sculpting my dreams.
